main event: An observer reported seeing a greenish-gray triangular object that appeared to be revolving and emitting a light underneath on 29 August 1968.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 3 minutes., The object was described as smaller than a car., The observer indicated the sighting could be a misinterpretation of a hot air balloon., The sighting was reported at twilight or night., The witnesses did not return their forms within the required timeframe.
witness description: An observer who reported the sighting but did not provide additional forms.
